mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into hero (img, `name`, local_name, primary_attr, attribs, attack, roles, `desc`, create_time, update_time) values (#{img,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{localName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{primaryAttr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attack,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{roles,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{desc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, now(), now()) on duplicate key update img = #{img,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, local_name = #{localName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, primary_attr = #{primaryAttr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, attribs = #{attribs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, attack = #{attack,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, roles = #{roles,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `desc` = #{desc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = now()
mapper.update: update hero set img = #{img,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, local_name = #{localName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, primary_attr = #{primaryAttr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, attribs = #{attribs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, attack = #{attack,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, roles = #{roles,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `desc` = #{desc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, img, `name`, local_name, primary_attr, attribs, attack, roles, `desc`, create_time, update_time from hero where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, img, `name`, local_name, primary_attr, attribs, attack, roles, `desc`, create_time, update_time from hero
mapper.insert:
insert into hero (img, `name`, local_name, primary_attr, attribs, attack, roles, `desc`) values
(#{item.img,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.localName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.primaryAttr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.attribs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.attack,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.roles,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.desc,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
on duplicate key update img = VALUES(img), `name` = VALUES(`name`), local_name = VALUES(local_name), primary_attr = VALUES(primary_attr), attribs = VALUES(attribs), attack = VALUES(attack), roles = VALUES(roles), `desc` = VALUES(`desc`)
